data.title: Managing Students’ Emotion in Order to Foster Innovation
data.meta_description: The existence of a self, an individual, with emotions and will, the potential to be responsible and to act responsibly, are fundamental issues in educational philosophy. The term ‘Bildung’ refers to self-cultivation – a process of transformation,...
data.text:
